reviews.title: What they say about me
reviews.review-1: His ability to manage important details while meeting deadlines is impressive. A trusted resource.
reviews.review-2: Haroun is an excellent developer who demonstrated his learning and adaptation skills during his assignment at Michelin.
reviews.review-3: Haroun has a remarkable ability to find pragmatic solutions to the problems he encounters.
reviews.review-4: He was a colleague I could count on, even in the most stressful situations.
reviews.review-5: Haroun demonstrated incredible adaptability, quickly finding his footing in a demanding and high-end environment.

about.description: Welcome, I'm Haroun, a passionate Front-End developer. I love turning visions into digital realities, creating intuitive and high-performance web experiences using React, JavaScript, and modern technologies.
